summary.span: Normalizes the specified structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正規化維護其方向，但它的大小會變成`1`。A normalized maintains its direction but its magnitude becomes `1`. 產生通常稱為單位向量。The resulting is often called a unit vector. A正規化除以依據其重要性。A is normalized by dividing the by its magnitude. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將正規化結構。The following example shows how to normalize a structure. [!code-csharp[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mil3dvectorsample3dn21)] [!code-vb[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mil3dvectorsample3dn21)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何計算兩個積結構。The following example shows how to calculate the dot product of two structures. 它也示範如何將值指派給結構時所宣告的結構，以及之後已宣告的結構。It also shows how to assign values to a structure when the structure is being declared and after the structure has been declared.
